description:
Receiving the news that she has failed her first Angel Exam, Misha disappears. Kotarou is slowly plunged into despair as he realizes how much Misha means to him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cómo encontrar lo que se ha perdido
How to Find Something That Was Lost
Manière de retrouver ce que l’on a perdu
なくしたものの見つけ方
